explicit

Interface CTMC

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DTMC, Model
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CTMCSimple

    public interface CTMC
extends DTMC
    Interface for classes that provide (read) access to an explicit-state CTMC.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface explicit.DTMC

        DTMC.TransitionConsumer, DTMC.TransitionToDoubleFunction

    • Method Detail

      • getExitRate

        double getExitRate(int i)
        Get the exit rate for state i. i.e. sum_j R(i,j)

      • getMaxExitRate

        double getMaxExitRate()
        Compute the maximum exit rate. i.e. max_i { sum_j R(i,j) }

      • getMaxExitRate

        double getMaxExitRate(java.util.BitSet subset)
        Compute the maximum exit rate over states in subset. i.e. max_{i in subset} { sum_j R(i,j) }

      • getDefaultUniformisationRate

        double getDefaultUniformisationRate()
        Compute the default rate used to uniformise this CTMC.

      • getDefaultUniformisationRate

        double getDefaultUniformisationRate(java.util.BitSet nonAbs)
        Compute the default rate used to uniformise this CTMC, assuming that all states *not* in nonAbs have been made absorbing.

      • buildImplicitEmbeddedDTMC

        DTMC buildImplicitEmbeddedDTMC()
        Build the embedded DTMC for this CTMC, in implicit form (i.e. where the details are computed on the fly from this one).

      • getImplicitEmbeddedDTMC

        DTMC getImplicitEmbeddedDTMC()
        Get the embedded DTMC for this CTMC, in implicit form (i.e. where the details are computed on the fly from this one).

        If there is no cached embedded DTMC, build it and cache it. Otherwise, return the cached one.

        If the underlying CTMC has changed, build a fresh one using buildImplicitEmbeddedDTMC, which will update the cached embedded DTMC.

      • buildEmbeddedDTMC

        DTMCSimple buildEmbeddedDTMC()
        Build (a new) embedded DTMC for this CTMC.

      • uniformise

        void uniformise(double q)
        Convert this CTMC into a uniformised CTMC.
        Parameters:
        q - Uniformisation rate

      • buildImplicitUniformisedDTMC

        DTMC buildImplicitUniformisedDTMC(double q)
        Build the uniformised DTMC for this CTMC, in implicit form (i.e. where the details are computed on the fly from this one).
        Parameters:
        q - Uniformisation rate

      • buildUniformisedDTMC

        DTMCSimple buildUniformisedDTMC(double q)
        Build (a new) uniformised DTMC for this CTMC.
        Parameters:
        q - Uniformisation rate
